store/netreviews.info.one: For further information on the nature of the review controls, as well as the possibility of contacting the author of the review please consult our
store/netreviews.info.two: No inducements have been provided for these reviews.
store/netreviews.info.three: Reviews are published and kept for a period of five years.
store/netreviews.info.four: Reviews can not be modified: If a customer wishes to modify their review then they can do so by contacting Verified Reviews directly to remove the existing review and publish an amended one.
